name: sms.validation.cellnumber.changed
text: Hi %user.firstName% %user.lastName%, We have detected that your mobile phone number at %domain.name% has changed. Please validate your new mobile phone number by entering the code %sms.validate.token% or clicking on %sms.validate.url%.

placeholders.name: %sms.validate.url%
placeholders.description: A link which the player clicks on to validate his/her email address
